original_text: Then they speedily took down every man his sack to the ground, and opened every man his sack.
korean_text: 그들이 각각 급히 자루를 땅에 내려놓고 자루를 각기 푸니

sentences.original_text: Then they speedily took down every man his sack to the ground
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 속히 각자 자신의 자루를 땅에 내려놓았고

sentences.original_text: and opened every man his sack
